s0482.chinese: 十三年四月戊午，魏君為王，韓亦為王。
s0482.literal: Thirteenth year fourth month day wuwu, Wei ruler became king, Han also became king.
s0482.idiomatic: Thirteenth year fourth month day wuwu, Wei ruler became king, Han also became king.

s0483.chinese: 使張儀伐取陜，出其人與魏。
s0483.literal: Sent Zhang Yi to attack and take Xia, moved its people to Wei.
s0483.idiomatic: Sent Zhang Yi to attack and take Xia, moved its people to Wei.

s0484.literal: Fourteenth year, changed to first year.
s0484.idiomatic: Fourteenth year, changed to first year.

s0485.chinese: 二年，張儀與齊、楚大臣會齧桑。
s0485.literal: Second year, Zhang Yi met with Qi and Chu ministers at Ni Sang.
s0485.idiomatic: Second year, Zhang Yi met with Qi and Chu ministers at Ni Sang.

s0486.literal: Third year, Han and Wei crown princes came to court.
s0486.idiomatic: Third year, Han and Wei crown princes came to court.

s0487.literal: Zhang Yi became prime minister of Wei.
s0487.idiomatic: Zhang Yi became prime minister of Wei.

s0488.literal: Fifth year, the king toured to Beihe.
s0488.idiomatic: Fifth year, the king toured to Beihe.

s0489.literal: Seventh year, Yue Chi became prime minister of Qin.
s0489.idiomatic: Seventh year, Yue Chi became prime minister of Qin.

s0490.chinese: 韓、趙、魏、燕、齊帥匈奴共攻秦。
s0490.literal: Han, Zhao, Wei, Yan, Qi led the Xiongnu to attack Qin together.
s0490.idiomatic: Han, Zhao, Wei, Yan, Qi led the Xiongnu to attack Qin together.

s0491.chinese: 秦使庶長疾與戰修魚，虜其將申差，敗趙公子渴、韓太子奐，斬首八萬二千。
s0491.literal: Qin sent Senior Minister Ji to battle at Xiuyu, captured their general Shen Chai, defeated Zhao prince Ke and Han crown prince Huan, beheaded 82,000.
s0491.idiomatic: Qin sent Senior Minister Ji to battle at Xiuyu, captured their general Shen Chai, defeated Zhao prince Ke and Han crown prince Huan, beheaded 82,000.

s0492.literal: Eighth year, Zhang Yi again became prime minister of Qin.
s0492.idiomatic: Eighth year, Zhang Yi again became prime minister of Qin.

s0493.literal: Ninth year, Sima Cuo attacked Shu, destroyed it.
s0493.idiomatic: Ninth year, Sima Cuo attacked Shu, destroyed it.

s0494.chinese: 伐取趙中都、西陽十年，韓太子蒼來質。
s0494.literal: Attacked and took Zhao's Zhongdu, Xiyang. Tenth year, Han crown prince Cang came as hostage.
s0494.idiomatic: Attacked and took Zhao's Zhongdu, Xiyang. Tenth year, Han crown prince Cang came as hostage.

s0496.literal: Attacked and defeated Zhao general Ni.
s0496.idiomatic: Attacked and defeated Zhao general Ni.

s0497.literal: Attacked and took twenty-five Yiqiu cities.
s0497.idiomatic: Attacked and took twenty-five Yiqiu cities.

s0498.chinese: 十一年，摢裏疾攻魏焦，降之。
s0498.literal: Eleventh year, Li Ji attacked Wei's Jiao, captured it.
s0498.idiomatic: Eleventh year, Li Ji attacked Wei's Jiao, captured it.

s0499.chinese: 敗韓岸門，斬首萬，其將犀首走。
s0499.literal: Defeated Han at Anmen, beheaded 10,000, their general Xi Shou fled.
s0499.idiomatic: Defeated Han at Anmen, beheaded 10,000, their general Xi Shou fled.
